headline: Needing Dollars, Iran-Backed Militias Turn to Visa and Mastercard
summary: Armed groups lost access to dollars when a banking loophole was closed. They quickly pivoted to exploit a currency-exchange scheme using cards that at its peak involved $1.5 billion a month.
